title: Device rotation causes crash
body:
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
1. Open any accounts/transactions view
2. Rotate the device

#### Expected behaviour
3. The list of accounts should be rotated

#### Actual behaviour
3. The app crashes


#### Software specifications
* GnuCash Android version: 6.0.1
* System Android version: 2.1.5
* Device type: Nexus 5
